description:
A simple, opinionated, no nonsense watch face that includes everything you would want from a watch face. 

Features:
- Time takes centrefold for quick glances
- Bluetooth Disconnect also changes the watch face to be black text on white (see last screenshot)
- Battery level indicator
- Charging and Full Charge Indicator
- Weekday, Date
- Supports 24h Time
